title: CoderDojo South Bay - November 2015
desc: teaches kids 7-17 to code in the beautiful South Bay of Los Angeles. ? Our next event will take place at the beautiful new Manhattan Beach Public Library on Highland Avenue on Saturday, November 21st, from 10am - 12pm.? ? And as a special bonus, we have a special?CoderDojo South Bay Girls Only Coding Event immediately following our regular CoderDojo event. ?Look out for the separate event invite email. ? Parents must accompany kids if they are 13 or under, and your child needs to bring a fully charged laptop, if possible.?We may have a few extra laptops, though, but only if you email us directly to coordinate ahead of time. ? ? We will be hosting sessions for both Beginning and Advanced levels. ?Kids will learn how to use Scratch, code their own web pages, basic programming and more! ? ? Remember, CoderDojos have just one rule: "Above All: Be Cool"?-?our goals are to have fun, learn and share with each other. ? We hope you can make it! ? Cheers, ? CoderDojo South Bay
